alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 1:33PM EDT until September 11 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Eastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 132 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midway to Doak Campbell Stadium to near Woodville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Midway, Woodville, Tallahassee, Havana, Quincy, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Cody, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Rocky Hill and Miccosukee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
